title: I have a 2007 Audi A3. I can pair via BT but there is no audio during a call. Why?
content:
My phone and car are connected via BT. I know this because if I make a call, the music in my car (i.e. radio) stops and it shows a call is being made. But no audio comes through. What is the fix?

I had a Pixel2 (and numerous Nexus and Pixel phones before this) and never had an issue until now.
